ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When Allah's help and victory have arrived
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: WHEN THE HELP of God arrives and victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When the help comes from Allah, and victory (is granted),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), when help and victory comes from God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When the help and victory of Allah come,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When there comes the help of Allah and the Conquest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When there comes the help of Allah and the victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When comes the help of God, and victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When Allah's succour and the triumph cometh
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When God's help and victory come,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When there cometh the succour of Allah and the victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When Allah’s help comes with victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When comes the Help of Allah, and Victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When comes the Help of Allah (to you, O Muhammad (Peace be upon him) against your enemies) and the conquest (of Makkah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When the victory of Allah and the opening comes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When there comes God’s victory, and conquest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [110:1] (This was revealed at Minā during the Farewell Pilgrimage, hence it is considered Medinese: it was the last sūra to be revealed; it consists of 3 verses.) When the help of God, for His Prophet (s), against his enemies, comes together with victory, the victory over Mecca,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 776 And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said about the interpretation of Allah's saying (When Allah's succour): '(When Allah's succour) against His enemies, Quraysh as well as others, (and the triumph) and the conquest of Mecca (cometh
